casebody.data:
Van REYPEN
v.
TEETER. No. 84PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, Fred P. Parker, IV, for Van Reypen Asso. D. Lane Matthews, Charlotte, for Gerald Teeter, et al. Isaac T. Avery, III, Raleigh, for NC Asso. Police Attorneys. Kimberly N. Overton, for NC Conference of DA. Christopher G. Browning, Solicitor-General, for Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of August 2006 by Plaintiff for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
